posts.post_content:
Super nice Tolstoi back, beautiful colors, nice left to right centering.  nice clean back. Highest graded example out of 19 total graded (PSA & SGC combined).  spec on front appears to be original Tolstoi tobacco!  

$1250 shipped PPFF preferred, PM for more details, etc...

thanks!  Cliff
